title: Virtual Reality-Based Immersive Learning Design in Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic VR device operation skills and foundational knowledge in social sciences
context.additional_context: Learners periodically study VR content using personal mobile devices and participate in historical simulations and social interaction activities

learning_goals: Learners can explain the social context of historical events with ≥80% accuracy via VR simulations
Learners can present and incorporate feedback on social problem-solving solutions ≥2 times through VR-based collaborative activities
Learners can produce analytical reports on user experience (immersion, interaction efficiency) in VR learning environments based on evaluation criteria
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
